publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-4142 Jim Tolson: Rosyth to Zeebrugge Ferry Service—That the Parliament welcomes the resumption of the Rosyth to Zeebrugge ferry service; congratulates Norfolkline for providing Scottish Viking, a brand new vessel with lower fuel consumption and CO2 emissions for the route; further congratulates Norfolkline for keeping to the promised timescales announced last year and working with community representatives and local business to provide an improved fare structure and passenger service, and urges VisitScotland to take advantage of the opportunity to market Scotland as a destination for the European tourist.

S3M-4142 Rosyth to Zeebrugge Ferry Service (lodged on 13 May 2009) Iain Smith*, Joe FitzPatrick*, Ross Finnie*, Hugh O’Donnell*, Kenneth Gibson*, Hugh Henry*, Mike Pringle*, Mike Rumbles*, Sandra White*, Bill Kidd*, Patrick Harvie*, Alison McInnes*

S3M-4142 Jim Tolson: Rosyth to Zeebrugge Ferry Service—That the Parliament welcomes the resumption of the Rosyth to Zeebrugge ferry service; congratulates Norfolkline for providing Scottish Viking, a brand new vessel with lower fuel consumption and CO2 emissions, for the route; further congratulates Norfolkline for keeping to the promised timescales announced last year and working with community representatives and local business to provide an improved fare structure and passenger service, and urges VisitScotland to take advantage of the opportunity to market Scotland as a destination for the European tourist. Supported by: Iain Smith, Joe FitzPatrick, Ross Finnie, Hugh O’Donnell, Kenneth Gibson, Hugh Henry, Mike Pringle, Mike Rumbles, Sandra White, Bill Kidd, Patrick Harvie, Alison McInnes, Robin Harper*, Marilyn Livingstone*
S3M-4142 Rosyth to Zeebrugge Ferry Service (lodged on 13 May 2009) Liam McArthur*, Nicol Stephen*
S3M-4142 Rosyth to Zeebrugge Ferry Service (lodged on 13 May 2009) Cathy Peattie*, Gil Paterson*
S3M-4142 Rosyth to Zeebrugge Ferry Service (lodged on 13 May 2009) Karen Whitefield*
S3M-4142 Rosyth to Zeebrugge Ferry Service (lodged on 13 May 2009) Sarah Boyack*
S3M-4142 Rosyth to Zeebrugge Ferry Service (lodged on 13 May 2009) Stuart McMillan*
